overview:
Joe is a senior technology executive and strategy consultant with a unique blend of experience in 4th generation telecommunications services (wireless, CATV and mobile broadband), financial services, payment systems, enterprise software, alliances, and consumer electronics.

He brings detailed technical knowledge, a wealth of senior level contacts and hands-on experience in assessing market opportunities, launching products, implementing marketing strategies, creating alliances, managing JV’s, and licensing technology..

As an entrepreneur he co-founded GCS-Team, LLP, [ visit: www.gcs-team.com] a high tech consultancy and has served as a V.P. with several successful start-ups. For GCS clients he choreographed VC fund raising and directed analyst interviews, IPO road shows and media/press tours.

Joe’s academic accomplishments include an MBA from De Paul University, BS in Marketing and Computer Science from the Univ. of Illinois. In addition, he completed the post-MBA joint Harvard - MIT executive development program and PMP program at Armstrong Atlantic University.
